pr_title: Add IBM i specific chagnes to fix build issues

timeline.bodyText:
Suggested change
        
          
    

        
      
    
    
      
          
            
            #if defined(J9OS_I5_V6R1)
          
          
            
            /*getsystemcfg() doesn't supported on i 7.1, no need to define the functions getCacheTypes & getCacheSize*/
          
          
            
            #else
          
          
            
            /* getsystemcfg() isn't supported on i 7.1 so there's no need to define the 
          
          
            
             * functions `getCacheTypes` & `getCacheSize` on the i-series platforms
          
          
            
             */
          
          
            
            #if !defined(J9OS_I5_V6R1)
timeline.author: DanHeidinga

timeline.message:
Add IBM i specific chagnes to fix build issues

Signed-off-by: gaoli <gaolibj@cn.ibm.com>
